Package org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcontroller.external.samples

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicOpMode_Iterative
    This file contains an example of an iterative (Non-Linear) "OpMode".
    BasicOpMode_Linear
    This file contains an minimal example of a Linear "OpMode".
    ConceptCompassCalibration
    This file illustrates the concept of calibrating a MR Compass It uses the common Pushbot hardware class to define the drive on the robot.
    ConceptDIMAsIndicator
    This OpMode illustrates using the Device Interface Module as a signalling device.
    ConceptI2cAddressChange
    An example of a linear op mode that shows how to change the I2C address.
    ConceptMotorBulkRead  
    ConceptNullOp
    Demonstrates empty OpMode
    ConceptRampMotorSpeed
    This OpMode ramps a single motor speed up and down repeatedly until Stop is pressed.
    ConceptRevSPARKMini
    This OpMode executes a basic Tank Drive Teleop for a two wheeled robot using two REV SPARKminis.
    ConceptScanServo
    This OpMode scans a single servo back and forwards until Stop is pressed.
    ConceptSoundsASJava
    This file demonstrates how to play simple sounds on both the RC and DS phones.
    ConceptSoundsOnBotJava
    This file demonstrates how to play simple sounds on both the RC and DS phones.
    ConceptSoundsSKYSTONE
    This file demonstrates how to play one of the several SKYSTONE/Star Wars sounds loaded into the SDK.
    ConceptTelemetry
    ConceptTelemetry illustrates various ways in which telemetry can be transmitted from the robot controller to the driver station.
    ConceptVuforiaNavigation
    This 2016-2017 OpMode illustrates the basics of using the Vuforia localizer to determine positioning and orientation of robot on the FTC field.
    ConceptVuforiaNavigationWebcam
    This 2016-2017 OpMode illustrates the basics of using the Vuforia localizer to determine positioning and orientation of robot on the FTC field.
    ConceptVuforiaUltimateGoalNavigation
    This 2020-2021 OpMode illustrates the basics of using the Vuforia localizer to determine positioning and orientation of robot on the ULTIMATE GOAL FTC field.
    ConceptVuMarkIdentification
    This OpMode illustrates the basics of using the Vuforia engine to determine the identity of Vuforia VuMarks encountered on the field.
    ConceptVuMarkIdentificationWebcam
    This OpMode illustrates the basics of using the Vuforia engine to determine the identity of Vuforia VuMarks encountered on the field.
    ConceptWebcam
    This OpMode illustrates how to open a webcam and retrieve images from it.
    HardwarePushbot
    This is NOT an opmode.
    PushbotAutoDriveByEncoder_Linear
    This file illustrates the concept of driving a path based on encoder counts.
    PushbotAutoDriveByGyro_Linear
    This file illustrates the concept of driving a path based on Gyro heading and encoder counts.
    PushbotAutoDriveByTime_Linear
    This file illustrates the concept of driving a path based on time.
    PushbotAutoDriveToLine_Linear
    This file illustrates the concept of driving up to a line and then stopping.
    PushbotTeleopPOV_Linear
    This OpMode uses the common Pushbot hardware class to define the devices on the robot.
    PushbotTeleopTank_Iterative
    This file provides basic Telop driving for a Pushbot robot.
    SampleRevBlinkinLedDriver  
    SensorAdafruitRGB  
    SensorBNO055IMU
    SensorBNO055IMU gives a short demo on how to use the BNO055 Inertial Motion Unit (IMU) from AdaFruit.
    SensorBNO055IMUCalibration
    SensorBNO055IMUCalibration calibrates the IMU accelerometer per "Section 3.11 Calibration" of the BNO055 specification.
    SensorColor
    This is an example LinearOpMode that shows how to use a color sensor in a generic way, regardless of which particular make or model of color sensor is used.
    SensorDigitalTouch  
    SensorDIO  
    SensorKLNavxMicro  
    SensorMRColor  
    SensorMRCompass
    The SensorMRCompass op mode provides a demonstration of the functionality provided by the Modern Robotics compass sensor.
    SensorMRGyro  
    SensorMRIrSeeker  
    SensorMROpticalDistance  
    SensorMRRangeSensor
    SensorMRRangeSensor illustrates how to use the Modern Robotics Range Sensor.
    SensorREV2mDistance
    SensorREV2mDistance illustrates how to use the REV Robotics Time-of-Flight Range Sensor.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SampleRevBlinkinLedDriver.DisplayKind
